Title: Spinner Game
Description: A great activity for your kid to learn new vocabualary. Fun and easy

Title: Hammer Game
Description: A fun game for the kid's attention and reaction development. A great activity for learning vocabulary

Title: Who has the hat game
Description: Kids love this game! You do not need many materials just a hat and flashcards.

Title: Daily Talk game
Description: A great activity to review daily talk phrases. Materials needed: plastic balls, name cards, flashcards, a toy hammer, a basket and a spinner

Title: Round dance game YOU!
Description: A super fun game for a child and his/her friends. You need at least 4 children to play the game

Title: Duel game
Description: This game is wonderful for attention development. To play the game you need flashcards with target vocabulary

Title: Basketball Game
Description: If your child likes to play basketball this game is ideal for you. The child can play and learn. You need basketball, basketball hoop and flashcards
